skilllist.skilldesc:
When Thamuz is holding his <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>, each of his Basic Attacks has a chance to conjure a burst of Lava Energy beneath the target that erupts after a 0.7s delay, dealing 45<font color="ffe63c"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color="ffe63c">(+5*Hero Level)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.
When without <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>, Thamuz gains 25% extra Movement Speed and will enhance his next Basic Attack after retrieving the <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>. The enhanced Basic Attack slows the target by 30% and is guaranteed to trigger Lava Energy.

Thamuz tosses <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> in the target direction. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 120<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. The <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> will then slow nearby enemies by 30% and deal 45<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> every 0.5s.
After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or a certain distance, the <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font> will return to Thamuz and drag enemies in their path to him. Thamuz can approach the Scythes or cast the skill again to retrieve them.

Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 230<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slow the enemy units by 25% for 2s upon landing. 
If the Scythes are still travelling, they will return to Thamuz and <font color="a6aafb">Molten Scythes</font> will reset its CD instantly.

Thamuz spouts the lava stored in his body, dealing 300<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and creating a <font color="a6aafb">Cauterant Zone</font> around him. The <font color="a6aafb">Cauterant Zone</font> lasts 9s and deals 30<font color="fba51f"> (+10% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> every 0.5s to enemies in the area.
Meanwhile, Thamuz gains 500 extra Max HP, heals himself by the same amount, and increases his Attack Speed by 1.3 times. He also recovers 1.5% Max HP each time he deals damage with Basic Attacks or his <font color="a6aafb">Scythes</font>.

assist.desc: Thamuz can play to his strength when working with Supports who provide Movement Speed or CC, such as Angela and Rafaela, because they enable him to stay on his targets.

strong.desc: Thamuz is good against other sustained damage Fighters like Zilong and Sun because he has the top notch laning power.

weak.desc: Thamuz is countered by agile Marksmen, such as Karrie and Irithel, since he lacks CC and relies on Basic Attacks, making him an easy target to kite.
